news.title: What Trump's Nvidia and AMD China deal means for the world
news.summary: AMD and Nvidia get access to a huge market. Analysts said the deal to give some China revenue to the U.S. government is positive for both companies.

news.title: Paramount buys UFC rights in $7.7 billion, 7-year deal in first major move post-Skydance merger
news.summary: The deal will eliminate the pay-per-view model used by ESPN in its current UFC deal. All events will be available for no extra charge on Paramount+.

news.title: Bitcoin retakes $120,000, ether touches 2021 highs after breaking key $4,000 level
news.summary: Bitcoin is a stone's throw from its all-time high after an overnight rally. ether also propelled ether to levels not seen since 2021.

news.title: C3 AI stock falls 30% as CEO Siebel calls preliminary sales numbers 'completely unacceptable'
news.summary: C3 AI shares tumbled after it announced preliminary financial results and a restructuring of its global sales and services organization. C3 AI is a global leader in the field of artificial intelligence.

news.title: Lithium stocks surge after Chinese mine suspends production
news.summary: CATL suspended production at the Yichun Project after the mine's permit expired Saturday. The company says the mine will not resume production until the permit is renewed.

news.title: I have $140,000 in a 401(k) and earn $45,000 a year. Can I retire in 20 years?
news.summary: “My 401(k) retirement planner shows I’ll likely be short $1,500 every month during my retirement.”

news.title: ‘This scam stuff is going to get worse’: A man approached me in my car — he had a crazy story
news.summary: “I got rid of him by asking for a business card and a company name, and he bugged out,” she says.

news.title: These lithium stocks are surging as a mine in China goes offline. Can the rally continue?
news.summary: The supply of metal used for electric vehicles and computer batteries has been growing. But stocks of lithium companies are rallying as another mine shuts down.

news.title: AMC sees moviegoers spending record amounts — and its stock surges. ‘Choke on that!’ says CEO.
news.summary: AMC's CEO had a blunt message as the movie-theater chain is riding a rebound. AMC’s CEO said the company needs to focus on its core business. The company has more than 2,000 theaters.

news.title: Dot-com parallel leads to fear of what’s next for this record-busting stock market
news.summary: A new chart offers some parallels between current markets and the Internet boom and bust. How much of a problem is tech dominance? Few seem willing to bet against it right now.
